WEBSITE_URL.description: The website URL that has the Xenforo API attached to it. Example: 'https://example.com/api' (No trailing '/'s)

API_KEY.description: The API key to use with the Xenforo API for the WEBSITE_URL. This is only used internally and never exposed to the users using this API

API_USER.description: The API user-type that the API_KEY is referencing, by default this will use 'guest' from Xenforo
